Removing Version Labels

Use the Delete Version Label dialog (Actions | Version Label | Delete) to remove a version label from a revision.

To delete a version label:

  1. Select the files, projects, folders, or project database that contains the version label you want to delete.

  2. Select Actions | Version Label | Delete. The Delete Version Label from File dialog box appears.

  3. Enter the version label that you want to delete in the Version Label field or click the Browse button to select one.

  4. To delete the version label in files within subprojects of the selected project or project database, select the Include files in subprojects check box.

  5. Click OK.
